column5: Interesting read from the top pros in the Classic.  http://sports.espn.go.com/outdoors/tournam...tory?id=3930455
No real surprizes on the lures though, jigs, soft plastics and spinnerbaits, probably what wins most of them, mix in a crank bait or surface lure.
I have to be honest I have never heard of the "Biosonix unit".....wow I'm amazed. Skeet throws in a shout to Biosonix.  http://www.tacklewarehouse.com/descpage-BXSFA.html
I looked at those last year and I thought it might work.  Who knows.  I remember almost buying the color colorClector backin the 80s.
I never knew those things even existed until I read the article. Like you say, $700 is worth it if you win $500K.
